page.title: 11HILL SHEEP PRODUCTION CYCLE.
page.content: Nov. _ Tupping _Ewes put to Ram. Dec. _ Sheep live out on the open moor Jan. _Ministry pays Sheep Subsidy on flock numbers 1st. 1986 _ Â£6.25 Feb. _Sheep given extra feed during bad weather & 6 weeks before lambing starts. March_Health check prior to lambing & sorting ewes into 1st.&2nd batch April_ Lambing May _ Marking _ all farms have their own marks. Sheep with single lambs turned out to moor,twins kept in better pastures. June _ Clipping _wool goes to Bradford 89._84.3p per kilo when graded. July _ Compulsory dipping. Aug. _Spaining _Taking lambs from mothers,prepare for selling. Sept._Lamb Sales Drafting out Ewes. Oct. _Compulsory winter dip.
